input.sentences: i made sure to prepare a lot of food for tonight .
a lot of the guests wanted something to drink as well so i got them a bottle of wine .
the food was hot and fresh from the stove .
afterward it was time to leave and i had a lot of dishes to do .
output.sentences: He was all prepared for the party with the alcohol stocked.
As the guests arrived, they sat down to a nice meal.
The food was delicious, fresh off the stove.
